apa samajaya thula wada wadath ropanaya kala yuththe ewan bodu sith ya.janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mathindunge udara nayakathwaya wisin le pipasitha kuriru thrasthawadayen, shri lanka mathawa mudagath palamu warsha purnayehi samarena mewara budu themangula uthuru nagenahira wehera wiharasthanayanhida, athi uthkarshawath lesa buddhalambhana prithiyen yuthuwa samarimata siyalu katayuthu sudanamkota thibe.uthureth, dakuneth, sahodara desawan sadhu nadayen udam wana me uthum dinaye saba bauddhayan lesa sadaham margaya, niwaradiwa handuna gannatath, ee ma’gehima yannatath, obata rathnathraye aashirwadaya labewa !suba wesak mangalyayak wewa !theruwan saranayi!
